short: Sentiment analysis is the process of assigning a subjective label to a text indicating the affective state or intention of the writer/speaker. We include it here as it can be quite useful when applied to transcriptions as well as movie/television reviews. The model used here provide a simple positive or negative prediction along with a score. Try a variety of example texts and see how the scores align with your own understanding of the data.
long:
Sentiment analysis is the process of assigning a subjective label to a text indicating the affective state or intention of the writer/speaker. We include it here as it can be quite useful when applied to transcriptions as well as movie/television reviews. The model used here provide a simple positive or negative prediction along with a score. Try a variety of example texts and see how the scores align with your own understanding of the data.

References

@article{sanh2019distilbert,
  title={DistilBERT, a distilled version of BERT: Smaller, faster, cheaper and lighter. arXiv 2019},
  author={Sanh, Victor and Debut, L and Chaumond, J and Wolf, T},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:1910.01108},
  year={2019}
}
